text: V skote - verblyudakh, korovakh, ovtsakh - dlya vas yest' nazidaniye, dokazyvayushcheye Nashu moshch' i to, chto My daruyem vam blago. My poim vas molokom iz ikh utrob, priyatnym i logkim dlya pit'ya. Krome moloka, v nikh dlya vas yeshcho mnogo pol'zy: myaso, kotoroye vy yedite, sherst' i pukh, kotoryye vy upotreblyayete v zhizni i poluchayete ot nikh sredstva k sushchestvovaniyu
